thread.title: Federal Prosecutors Sue MTA Over Subway Station Accessibility

author: Paul Berger
title: Federal Prosecutors Sue MTA Over Subway Station Accessibility
text:
Federal prosecutors have joined a lawsuit against the agency that runs New York City’s subway, accusing the Metropolitan Transportation Authority of violating federal law for not making a renovated station accessible to people with disabilities.
“There is no justification for public entities to ignore the requirements of the ADA,” interim U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman said Tuesday in reference to the Americans with Disabilities Act.
...
